full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUB DBANG GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG DANG BCAS PA LA MCHOD CING GSOL BA GDAB PA'I TSUL THUB BSTAN RGYAS BYED YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
location_of_printing_(хэвлэсэн_орон_нута: KHAL KHA GA-YAS RU 'DZA SAG THU RGYAL PO'I AA'I MAG HO THO KOD 'ING TSOGS TH'A THV'U SHVA YA GUNG RTA MGRIN GI SHOG
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,ZHES THUB DBANG GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG DANG BCAS PA LA MCHOD CING GSOL BA GDAB PA'I TSUL MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR DRIL NAS BKOD PA 'DI NI, THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS NA CI MA RUNG SNYAM DU SMON PAS, ^DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
